nodes.text: The Karazak Slavers' Cooperative, abbreviated KSC, was a slaver organization active during the time of the Galactic Empire. Karazak acquisition agents often frequented hyperspace routes in the Outer Rim Territories, searching for new markets and product species, though successful operations provided them with confidence to work further toward the Core. The Karazak Slavers' Cooperative were one of the slaver guilds active on the planet Kowak.
